name: CryptococcosisTestsForCryptococcusSpeciesAntigen
title: Cryptococcosis (Tests for Cryptococcus species Antigen)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Cryptococcosis antigen),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Cryptococcosis),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
